reference.title: Bat history
reference.shortdesc: Learn about the valuable role that bats have played in history

refbody.section: Throughout history, bats have been maligned and treated poorly. How undeserving! Bats have provided extremely valuable services to our well-being. One bat alone can eat a pound of mosquitoes in an hour!

property.propdesc: They come out mainly at night.
From the size of a bumblebee to the size of a fox.
From less than an inch to 6 feet.
